entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
